pageTitle: DELHI BANK CORP (DWNX:OTC Markets Group Inc - Current Information): Stock Quote & Company Profile - Businessweek
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {4811=Delhi Bank Corp. operates as a bank holding company for The Delaware National Bank of Delhi that provides commercial banking services to individual and small business customers in Delaware county, New York. Its deposit products comprise personal and business checking, NOW, health savings, club, money market, interest bearing, non-interest bearing, and savings accounts; demand deposits; investment certificates; fixed-rate certificates of deposit; and ATM and debit cards. The company also provides loans for automobiles, motorcycles, recreational vehicles, and boats; personal loans; home equity lines of credit; one- to four-family residential loans; commercial and multi-family real estate loans; construction, agricultural, home improvement, manufactured housing, rental property, second home, revolving credit, small business, and student loans; and overdraft protection loans, as well as Visa/Master cards. In addition, it offers trust and investment services; telephone banking and Internet banking services; and other services that primarily include safe deposit facilities, traveler’s checks, money orders, wire transfers, drive-through facilities, and 24-hour depositories. The company was founded in 1839 and is headquartered in Delhi, New York., 8691=Delhi Bank Corp. announced on March 18 that its board declared a first-quarter cash dividend of 16 cents per share. The dividend will be paid on or about April 15 to shareholders of record as of the close of business March 31. It represents an increase of 0.25% over the dividend of 15.96 cents per share declared for the quarter ending December 2014.}
